channel.title: adventures on Justin Napolitano
channel.description: Recent content in adventures on Justin Napolitano

item.title: Windy Peak Via Mountain Lion Loop
item.description: Windy Peak via Mountain Lion Loop I do not know much about this little day hike.. It seems to be fairly doable despite an all trails hard rating. I’ll find out in the am Details All Trails Link Driving Directions: Coal Creek Canyon, Colorado 80403 Trail Head : Nott Creek Trailhead Park Info: site Plan Driving Leave Littleon in the AM around 5 am.

item.title: Running
item.description: Running I like to run… or maybe I like to jog. It doesn’t really matter. I like move a little faster than walking. My Goals When I run I just move. I don’t really think about what my goals are. I guess I try to be fast. I think this is wrong. What would I rather focus on? Breathing Avoiding injury Remaining balanced Adapting to the terrain Breathing I hold my breath when I run.

item.title: Gray's Peak
item.description: Gray’s Gray’s is a rather easy 14’er about an hour west of Denver. 14er Link Details Coordinates: 39.66087, -105.78462 Elevation: 11,280' Trailhead Access: High Clearence Vehicle Camping: Yeah Restrooms: Yeah The Approach I borrowed an SUV. It was a doable drive. I kept her in first gear and took it slow. There were a few sketchy parts along the way.. but it really wasn’t too bad.. at least in the right vehicle.
